===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=もくせい}} {{m|zh|木犀}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|もくせい|モクセイ}}

# ''[[Osmanthus]] [[fragrans]]'', variously called the [[sweet]] [[osmanthus]], sweet [[olive]], [[tea]] olive, or [[fragrant]] olive: an [[evergreen]] [[shrub]] or [[small]] [[tree]] of the ''[[Oleaceae]]'' [[family]], native to Asia

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|木犀花|もくせいか}}: the [[flower]] of the fragrant olive
* {{ja-r|金木犀|きんもくせい}}: [[orange]]-[[bloom]]ing [[variety]] of the fragrant olive
* {{ja-r|銀木犀|ぎんもくせい}}: [[white]]-[[blooming]] variety of the fragrant olive

====See also====
* {{ja-r|丹桂|たんけい}}: golden osmanthus ([[w:Osmanthus fragrans|osmanthus fragrans]])
* {{ja-r|桂花|けいか}}: the orange-blooming variety of ''[[Osmanthus]] [[fragrans]]''; the [[flower]] of the orange-blooming variety
